name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click emoji downloader for Slack

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads slack emojis in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on custom slack emojis on https://slack.com/customize/emoji to seamlessly download the emojis with the appropriate name.
